New Records: Victor Wembanyama scored a career-high 35 points and recorded 18 rebounds
Nikola Jokic scored 41 points, grabbed 18 rebounds, and provided 9 assists
Key Match Events: Victor Wembanyama made a crucial steal with 4 seconds left
Devin Vassell scored a layup to seal the victory
Michael Porter Jr. missed a 34-foot three-pointer in the final seconds
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was decided in the final seconds
The Nuggets' three-game winning streak was snapped
